title: Jason Aldean Shares Advice On Getting Signed To His Label + Bobby Gets Surprised For National Boss's Day + Food Feud Championship & Easy Trivia!
itunes:title: Jason Aldean Shares Advice On Getting Signed To His Label + Bobby Gets Surprised For National Boss's Day + Food Feud Championship & Easy Trivia!
description:
Bobby gets surprised by the show for National Boss's Day. Jason Aldean stops by the studio to talk about new music, his new house and the story behind his proposal to his wife. We also ask what advice he’d give to a new artist wanting to get signed to his new label. Plus, we crown the "Food Feud" champion!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
